FEATURES :
The game Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - Mirror of Fate awaits familiar from previous games Castlevania series action, but this time will be added to a platform gameplay and 3D-graphics . Players will explore the castle Dracula and its surrounding area; find relics that will help improve your ability ; battle with horrible monsters . Tricky puzzles , devious traps , meetings with the nightmarish bosses - all this you have to go to defeat Dracula himself .

Features repack :
- Do not cut / no recoded
- Game Version : 1.0.684575.0 (Update 2)
- Integrated Russian translation (voice and text) from X360- Slub Localization Team / Wolf's eYe Multimedia / WeM
- Independent choice of language and voice text
- Setup time : ~ 2 minutes
